pkgmetadata.longdescription: Formulations of the International Association for the Properties of Water and Steam // Implementation of some of the formulations for the thermodynamic and transport properties released by the International Association for the Properties of Water and Steam (IAPWS). More specifically, the releases R1-76(2014), R5-85(1994), R6-95(2018), R7-97(2012), R8-97, R9-97, R10-06(2009), R11-24, R12-08, R15-11, R16-17(2018), R17-20 and R18-21 at https://iapws.org.
